sen.j: 姉小路 高基（あねこうじ たかもと、永仁6年（1298年） - 正平 (日本)13年/延文3年3月2日 (旧暦)（1358年4月10日））は鎌倉時代から南北朝時代 (日本)の公家。
sen.e: Takamoto ANEKOJI (1298 - April 18, 1358) was a Court noble from the Kamakura period to the periods of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).
Takamoto ANEKOJI (1298 - April 18, 1358) was a Court noble from the Kamakura period to the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).
Takamoto ANEKOJI (1298 - April 18, 1358) was a court noble from the Kamakura period to the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).
sen.cmt: Court を court に修正しました。

sen.e: His father was FUJIWARA no Yorimoto.
His father was FUJIWARA no Yorimoto.
His father was FUJIWARA no Yorimoto.

sen.j: 兄弟に姉小路家綱、姉小路基尹、姉小路頼時らがいる。
sen.e: His brothers included Ietsuna ANEKOJI, Mototada ANEKOJI and Yoritoki ANEKOJI.
His brothers included Ietsuna ANEKOJI, Mototada ANEKOJI and Yoritoki ANEKOJI.
His brothers included Ietsuna ANEKOJI, Mototada ANEKOJI and Yoritoki ANEKOJI.

sen.j: 飛騨国、宮内卿、参議をつとめた。
sen.e: He served in Hida Province, served as Kunaikyo (Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) and Sangi (Councilor).
He served in Hida Province, as Kunaikyo (Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) and Sangi (Councilor).
He served in Hida Province, as Kunaikyo (Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) and Sangi (Royal Advisor).
sen.cmt: Councilor をRoyal Advisor に修正しました。

sen.e: He was awarded the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
He was awarded the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
He was awarded the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).

sen.j: 正平13年/延文3年（1358年）3月2日に薨去。
sen.e: He died on April 18, 1358.
He died on April 18, 1358.
He died on April 18, 1358.
He was 61.
He was 61.
He died at the age of 62.
sen.cmt: He was 61 をHe died at the age of 62 に修正しました。※ 9セル目と一文に出来るようにも思われます。
